title: PrntScrn - Copy Images to Clipboard
description: This plugin is used to copy render targets and select 2D textures to your clipboard.
longDescription:
This plugin is used to copy render targets and select 2D textures to your clipboard.


2D Textures must be in one of the following formats:

  • B8G8R8A8
  • R8G8B8A8
  • FloatRGBA
  • FloatRGB


Functions

  • Copy Texture to Clipboard
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  A new function, `CopyTextureToClipboard`, that copies the texture to your clipboard
  • 2D Textures must be in one of the following formats:
  • B8G8R8A8
  • R8G8B8A8
  • FloatRGBA
  • FloatRGB 

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  •  Runtime
  • Core
  • CoreUObject
  • Engine
  • InputCore
  • RHI
  • RenderCore
  • Slate
  • SlateCore
  • ImageCore

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 2

Network Replicated: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows(x64) & Mac

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows(x64) & Mac

Important/Additional Notes:

  • 2D Textures must be in one of the following formats:
  • B8G8R8A8
  • R8G8B8A8
  • FloatRGBA
  • FloatRGB 
  • Plugin only supports Windows(x64) & Mac

Documentation: https://chipped-starburst-2a9.notion.site/PrntScrn-93241a560ea7470c819880ff60f5967e
